org.magnos.solver
Interface State<M>

Type Parameters:
M - The class which represents a move.
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractState, MazeBoard, NPuzzleBoard, PegsBoard, SodukoBoard, TetravexBoard
public interface State<M>

The basic interface for implementing Game State.

Author:
Philip Diffenderfer

Method Summary
 void addMove(M move)
          Applies the given Move to this State.
 State<M> getCopy()
          Gets an exact copy of this State.

          Returns the depth of this state.
 Object getHash()
          Returns the hash of this State.

          Returns a list of all possible moves for this state.

          Sets the depth of this state.

getDepth

getHash

Object getHash()
Returns the hash of this State. The hash object returned must have the hashCode() and equals() methods implemented to accurately compare against another hash object. If state A and B are the same state, then their hash objects will having matching hashCode() values and A.equals(B) will return true (same applies for B.equals(A)).
